programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The School Fete - Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU! - Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Stairs - A musical staircase magically appears in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take turns making music as they go up and down the stairs.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Gloves - Dee encourages a friend to say 'gloves' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different types of gloves - green gloves, woolly gloves, fingerless gloves and glowing gloves!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Thinking Outside the Boxes - When a Delivery Po has too many boxes to deliver, the team have to think of a clever way of fitting them into her truck.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep5
programme.desc: It's Time to Build a Bug Hotel - Gran Gran and Cynthia build a bug hotel and welcome some new residents. JoJo learns that different insects are attracted to different materials in the bug hotel.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep60
programme.desc: Caring Sharing Monty - Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep59
programme.desc: Camping - Monty tries to pack too many items for a camping trip, but he learns that sometimes less is more after he and Jimmy Jones work together.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Orangutans - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the rainforests of Borneo in South-East Asia in search of an orangutan mother and her baby.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Vet Tales S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Frank the cat - Ferne visits Grace and her pet cat Frank who has had a liver problem. Together they take Frank back to the vet to check his progress. Rory joins a vet at a Donkey Sanctuary to see a donkey get a wobbly tooth removed.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Jolly Splodger - Captain Sinker is bored of the Jolly Roger and wants a new flag. Meanwhile, Elaha, Hamza, Alhousain and Abdulghany are the Swashbucklers aiming to win back Gem's jewels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep14
programme.desc: The Accessory Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep38
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Weather Prediction Predicament - There's a storm brewing after Glitch's fake weather report puts the cadets in danger.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep14
programme.desc: Emily's Winter Party Special - It is wintertime on Sodor and there is going to be a Winter Festival at the Town Square. The Fat Controller tells the engines that he will choose the most helpful engine to be the party engine.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Fluff Bread - Sarah and Duck help the baker bake Shoku-pan, a light and fluffy type of Japanese bread.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mountain Mints - Scarf Lady takes Sarah and Duck on trip up the mountains. At the top of a mountain they find Poetry Pete reading a poem.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lost in Fog - It's very foggy in the Camping Park, the girls use sound to find their way around.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Dog Loves Art - Pug wants to learn how to paint. Our heroes visit Picasso's studio in Paris.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep58
programme.desc: Same Old Story - Monty wonders whether tales must always stay the same, or if the endings can sometimes be different. He ponders this as his grandmother reads him a story.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep27
programme.desc: The Thing That We Wanted To Eat - The Dinopaws are hungry but instead of eating a plant they look after it.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Home Away From Home - A sleepover at Finn's would be great fun if Herman wasn't feeling so homesick.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Room to Dance - A Citizen Po can't help bumping into the furniture of his little house as he practices his dancing.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Typewriter - Bluey, Snickers, and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Cursed! - Celebrity psychic Ernesto Estrella deems Great Lakes City to be bad luck and Abuela believes him!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep120
programme.desc: What's Love Gato Do With It? / Dial M. For Mustard - After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Family is No Picnic / The Undefeated Sammy Dynamite - It's family game day but while Kunal and Neil keep going head to head,Sammy and Raj promise not to get caught up in the competition. // When Kunal tells the boys to find an after-school club, they make an obvious choice: WRESTLING!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: My Fair Chipette - When Brittany declines Alvin's help for a talent show, he convinces Jeanette to enter, putting them at odds.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Gone Gal - When Miss Croner has a disagreement with Miss Miller, she fakes her disappearance to get even.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Time Traveler's Party - Simon tells Alvin time travel is impossible, until a man from the future shows up at their home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep150
programme.desc: Krusty Dogs / The Wreck of the Mauna Loa - Mr. Krabs decides to start selling hot dogs instead of Krabby Patties. // SpongeBob and Patrick discover a lost ship.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Jellyfish Kid - A young SpongeBob is determined to catch his first jellyfish, so his friends do whatever they can to help him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Catastrophe - When Nate is paired with Jenny on a school project, he hopes to prove his awesomeness to her, but his cat phobia threatens to destroy his cool. Meanwhile, Ellen sets out to cure Martin of a deeply ingrained phobia of his own.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Hurl, Interrupted / Diamonds are for Never - Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret. // After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep104
programme.desc: House Rules - Thrash is impatient with the family rules and convinces Mo to push boundaries. But when a Decepticon needs their help, Mo and Thrash find themselves playing by a far more dangerous set of rules.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep153
programme.desc: Accidents Will Happen / The Other Patty - When Squidward gets hurt at work, he threatens legal action unless Mr. Krabs caters to him hand and foot. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton may finally agree on something, when the popular "Flabby Patty" restaurant threatens to steal their customers!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep154
programme.desc: Drive Thru / The Hot Shot - Mr. Krabs tries to make even more money by turning a hole in the Krusty Krab wall into a cash-making drive-thru window! // Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, tries to teach SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep155
programme.desc: A Friendly Game / Sentimental Sponge - SpongeBob and Patrick turn SpongeBobs house into an indoor miniature golf course! // When SpongeBob realizes how many memories are attached to all of his possessions, he is reluctant to throw anything way.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Popular TV personality Deborah Hutton joins Anh for an engaging chat about her unusual childhood and shares stories of the men and women who shaped her life. Anh hopes to capture her iridescent charisma in his portrait.

programme.title: Q+A Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 16 - The latest snapshot of Australia shows the cost of health and aged care will soar over the next 40 years. Where should we be spending and who is going to pay for it? Olympian, author and Doctor Jana Pittman joins the panel.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Canada On Fire Ep17
programme.desc: In Canada Australian firefighters join an international team in a desperate battle to help combat the nation's worst forest fires in recorded history. An area of 32 million acres has been scorched in this climate catastrophe.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep152
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep172
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep157
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep172
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep134

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Power of Secret Service - Intelligence agencies are influencing governments and spying on countries with no regard for the law. And they are able to remain nearly invisible, in the process. Are they the new superpowers? The last time intelligence agencies commanded as much power as they do today was during the Cold War. Technological innovations mean that more sophisticated warfare is now a reality. It is not just about Russia and the USA anymore. We may be entering a new era of unrest. The U.S. has lost more spies and informants since 2010 than at any other time since the Cold War. Leaders of German intelligence agencies also acknowledge that they have once again fallen upon tough times. Money, data and access are proving to be major factors in determining who actually wields power. The 2016 U.S. election made this clear: U.S. intelligence agencies are certain that Russian intelligence helped elect Donald Trump. But the U.S. has lost old spheres of influence and allies are increasingly pursuing their own agendas. Can President Biden make his country a force for order in the world, again? And what does that mean for political hot spots and potential conflicts with China, Iran, and Russia? And for allies like Saudi Arabia and Turkey? Will Western intelligence agencies regain the power they once exerted? Wars fought with drone and hacker attacks, increasingly delegated power, and surveillance could push these conflicts to their tipping point.

programme.desc: News

programme.title: UFC 292: Sterling vs O'Malley
programme.desc: Main Event - Fresh from a major victory over Henry Cejudo, Aljamain Sterling puts his UFC bantamweight title on the line on August 19 against Sugar Sean OMalley in a quest to not just keep his crown but cement his place as the best bantamweight to ever wear UFC gold. In the co-main event of UFC 292, which takes place at TD Garden in Boston, Chinese star Zhang Weili defends her UFC strawweight championship against Brazilian battler Amanda Lemo

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep5
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep23
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Sneaky - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.
